title: Maruti Suzuki Swift 2024 Launch: Expected Price, features, mileage, design and other details in EPIC new Swift
description: Maruti Suzuki Swift Launch: Maruti Suzuki India is gearing up to launch the highly anticipated next-generation Swift, featuring a revamped design, new engine, and updated interior. Pre-bookings have begun at an initial payment of â‚¹11,000, with deliveries expected to commence in June 2024. The hatchback will hit the Indian market today, May 9, 2024, and the epic new swift promises to be a blend of sporty design and enhanced driving experience.
